title: Information We Collect
content: Personal & Contact Information: Name, email, phone number, learning preferences, educational background, and communication preferences.
Learning & Engagement Information: Course enrolments, quiz or assignment submissions, mentorship session logs, feedback, and progress tracking.
Technical Data: IP addresses, browser type, device data, access logs, and usage statistics for our learning platform or tools.
Cookies & Usage Tracking: We use cookies to enhance the learning experience and platform performance. You can manage cookie preferences via your browser settings.

title: How We Use Your Information
content: Provide personalized learning experiences, mentorship, and coding-related support.
Communicate important updates about classes, mentorship sessions, resources, or platform features.
Manage billing, course access, certifications, and support queries.
Ensure platform security, address technical issues, and analyze educational outcomes.
Fulfill legal and regulatory obligations where applicable.

title: Confidentiality & Data Sharing
content: We do not sell or rent your information. Your learning data is handled with strict confidentiality. We may share information only with:
Authorized instructors or mentors supporting your learning journey.
Trusted third-party service providers, such as:
• Payment processors
• Hosting services
• Learning and communication tools (e.g., Zoom, Google Classroom, Slack)
Legal authorities, if required by law or to defend our legal rights.

title: Data Security
content: Role-based access control for instructors and staff.
Encryption for sensitive data such as payment and login details.
Secure servers and infrastructure for hosting the learning platform.
Data protection protocols and confidentiality agreements with educators and team members.

title: Data Retention
content: We retain data only for as long as necessary to:
• Maintain learning records and certification history.
• Support ongoing mentorship and alumni services.
• Comply with financial, legal, or academic requirements.
You may request deletion or anonymization of your data upon course completion, subject to legal constraints.

title: Your Rights
content: Access your personal and learning-related data held by us.
Request corrections or updates to inaccurate information.
Request data deletion, where legally permissible.
Request information about our data handling and privacy practices.

title: Third-Party Tools & Links
content: In the course of learning, we may use third-party tools and platforms. These may include:
• Code sharing platforms (GitHub, Replit)
• Communication tools (Slack, Zoom)
• Learning management tools (Google Classroom, Notion)
We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these platforms, but we only collaborate with reputable, secure service providers.

title: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this policy from time to time to reflect changes in our learning services or privacy regulations. Updates will be communicated via email or our website.
The most current version will always be accessible at https://www.codefeast.in/privacy.
